original_text: Jesus replied, ‘A man that ploughs a field must continue to look straight in front of him. If he looks behind him, he cannot plough well. People that look back behind them cannot work well for the kingdom of God.’
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 손에 쟁기를 잡고 뒤를 돌아보는 자는 하나님의 나라에 합당하지 아니하니라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: A man that ploughs a field
must continue to look straight in front of him

sentences.korean_translation: 그는 잘 밭을 가질 수 없다

sentences.original_text: People that look back behind them
cannot work well for the kingdom of God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님 나라를 위해 잘 일할 수 없다
